name: Bug Battles
description:
Game made for the 2021 Github Game Off. Inspired by the Supreme Commander style of RTS. Play as a swarm of bugs crawling on the surface of somebody's skin.

Github Repository

Features:
  • Over 5 units and buildings!
    •  There are 6 units and buildings
  • Artisanal, hand crafted 3D models
  • A single 4 second long music track, played on repeat
    • Some units even have sound effects
  • A win condition
  • AI to fight against
    • Spectate mode so you can sit back and watch the AI fight each other to the death
Known Issues:
  • Performance kinda sucks as the bug count gets higher, so it needs a pretty good CPU
    • Also 
  • Lacks a lot of quality of life features
  • Units don't path find around buildings very well
  • AI isn't super smart but is surprisingly good for how simple it is
